title: What are some unbelievable photos? - Quora

response.answer_text: Natural formation of sandstone rock that looks like wave (Coyote Buttes of Arizona). 2. Zhangjiajie National Forest Park in China (Avatar Hallelujah Mountain)  3. Bran Castle (Dracula’s Castle) in Romania.  4. Two faced cat.  5. A statue of King Arthur on top of the Tintagel cliffs in Cornwall.  6. A brave Seattle iron worker, 1980  7. The giant of Illinois, Robert Wadlow (world’s tallest man ever) stood 272cm (8ft 11.1 in) tall and weighed 220kg.  8. Dark Hedges in Northern Ireland.  9. Feeding the swans in the snow.  10. Vatnajökull iced-cave in Iceland.  11. Half-graffiti hotel room.  12. Black and white Santa.  13. Lurch, the world’s largest horns.  14. Alicia Martin transformed thousands of disused books into tumultuous towers and spheres.  15. Methane bubbles (frozen), Abraham Lake.  16. Gold sandals during Pharaoh Queen, Queen Hatshepsut's reign. (Metropolitan Museum of Art, Fletcher Fund).  17. 99 years age difference: Happy 1st Birthday to Delancy, and happy 100th birthday to her great-great grandma, Rosalee (on the same day).  18. Spot on I-80 in Wyoming (highway to Heaven).  19. 6.55” Megalodon tooth found off the coast of North Carolina.  20. The Pit, A Dive Site In Tulum, Mexico  21. A view from a driver’s windshield.  22. Prague Astronomical Clock (the world’s oldest astronomical clock still in operation) installed in the year 1410— ticking for over 6 centuries.  23. Mr. Allen Swift (102-year-old) drove the same Rolls Royce (1928) for 82years.  24. Green roses are real and special. They’ve been around as early as 1743.  25. Appian Way; a 2,300-year-old Roman road in Italy.  26. Medieval Eltz Castle located in Wierschem, Germany. It has been owned and still occupied by same family for over 850 years (33 generations).  27. Big Jake, the tallest living horse, is a nine-year-old Belgian Gelding horse, who measured 20 hands 2.75 in (210.19 cm, 82.75 in), without shoes, at Smokey Hollow Farms in Poynette, Wisconsin, USA, on 19 January 2010.   https

1.] The headless horseman is one thing, but the headless gymnast?!  But actually: No magic, just amazing flexibility and a well-framed shot. 2.] But really, why walk when you can bike?  But actually: Whoever took this photo has the timing of a god. 3.] Legos bent that way ?  But actually: No, they don't. This one must just be magic. Seriously. 4.] Challenge gravity, you say?  But actually: This is just a street performance by German sorcerer Johan Lorbeer. He manages to stay elevated through the use of a hidden harness and a fake arm. 5.] This is why you don't build railways out of Silly Putty...  But actually: The aftermath of railway tracks after an earthquake in Canterbury, New Zealand. 6.] When did they invent androids?  But actually: This is Valeria Lukyanova, the Human Barbie. She has undergone major reconstructive surgery to achieve this look. 7.] "Did we take a wrong turn?"  But actually: A plane taxis across the Autobahn at Liepzig Airport. 8.] A man contemplates his life as his boat sinks.  But actually: The boat is designed to float that way. The man is attempting to do a stunt of walking along the keel while keeping his balance. 9.] The mountain was angry that day.  But actually: It just happened to spew lava in the shape of a skull. Spooky! 10.] When you see it...  But actually: This photo really puts life in perspective. 11.] Europe is a trippy, terrifying place.  But actually: At least the tarps used to cover buildings while being renovated were designed by someone on LSD. 12.] Bullshit! Trees don't bend like that!  But actually: Well, at least in this one forest in Poland, they do. 13.] The end is nigh, Cthulhu awakens.  But actually: This is just a combination of the perfect tide, clear water, and giant plumes of seaweed. 14. Who would spend all that money to CGI pizza in space?  But actually: The better question is who would actually send pizza into space. Anamanaguchi ( youtube ) that's who! 15. That's cute! Dressing a kitty up for Halloween...  But actually: This is actually Venus, a rare cat that has dual coloring. She even has her own Facebook page. 16.] Watch out! The sky is falling!  But actually: A giant sculpture by New Zealand artist Neil Dawson . 17.] Who ever would have thought a black hole would form in the suburbs?  But actually: No black hole, just an impressive demonstration of construction art on a house that is soon to be torn down. 18.] Minecraft is real! But only in the oceans ?  But actually: This is just a Cross sea : an area where waves from two different directions meet. 19. ] Jesus Walks !  But actually: Before you cue the Kanye, wait a little. This could just be a perfectly timed photo, right ? 20.] You better hope he's not still hungry after !  But actually: This is just a clever billboard demonstrating how wild marketing is in Indonesia. 21.] Is it a bird? Is it a plane? Is it two people falling through the air ¿  But actually: Nope! It's Salar de Uyuni, the world's largest salt flatland, in Bolivia. Every year it becomes covered in a small amount of water, turning it into the world's largest mirror. 22.] Floating colors? No Photoshop? Bullshit!   But actually: This is just a series of amazing optical illusions done by Swiss artist Felice Varini as installation pieces. 23.] So, this is the stretch tool, right?  But actually: Although it looks more like what would happen were a coyote to have chicken legs, the Maned Wolf is naturally so well endowed. ✌  Source :: [ 23 Real Photos That Will Make You Question The World ] ::
